
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Day5RotatedString2 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("Enter the original string:");
		String str = sc.next();
		System.out.println("Enter the rotated string:");
		String rot = sc.next();
		int ind = 0; int nextind=0;
		boolean flag = true;
		for (int i = 0; i < str.length(); i++) {
			while (rot.charAt(i) != str.charAt(ind) && ind<str.length()) {
				ind++;
			}
			if(ind==str.length() - 1)
				nextind=0;
			else
				nextind=ind+1;
			if (i != str.length() - 1) {
				if (rot.charAt(i + 1) != str.charAt(nextind)) {
					flag = false;
					break;
				}
			} else {
				if (rot.charAt(0) != str.charAt(nextind)) {
					flag = false;
					break;
				}
			}
			ind = 0;
			nextind=0;
		}
		if (flag == true) {
			System.out.println(rot + " is a rotation of " + str);
		} else
			System.out.println(rot + " is NOT a rotation of " + str);
		sc.close();
	}
}
